Dear User,


This application places great importance on the privacy of your personal data and fully complies with the provisions of the Personal Data Protection Law (KVKK). Below, you can find information about how your personal data is processed and protected.


1-Collection and Processing of Personal Data:

Our application may collect and process some of your personal data necessary to manage your travels and location sharing.
 The collected personal data will only be used for specific purposes.

 2-Protection of Personal Data:

Our application takes necessary technical and organizational measures to securely store and protect your personal data.
 Data security is ensured through encryption technologies and other security measures.


3-Sharing of Personal Data:
 Your personal data may be shared with competent authorities in accordance with legal regulations in certain situations. Your data will be requested with explicit consent before being shared with third parties.
 4-Access and Control of Personal Data:

You have the ability to access and edit your personal data through the application.
 Additionally, you can control your data usage permissions through the application settings.

 5-Cookies and Tracking Technologies:

Our application may use cookies and similar tracking technologies. For more information, you can review our cookie policy.
 For more information about the KVKK text, please visit the "KVKK" section within the application.

 If you have any questions, you can send an email to ahhmetgur@@gmail.com.com. 

 Sincerely,

 Travel Reservation Team
This application will inform you between cities and you can use it for your reservations.
